Aye, I could probably do that, provided I was online at the same 
time as Rudrak (a rare occurance), I had the time to teach Rudrak 
how to use an SSH encrypted Telnet client to connect to a Yan's 
Linux hosted server, and if I can find some instructions i used when 
i showed Hugar how to update the events page, it might speed up the 
process a bit. =)

BTW, the Char pages is updated now, and I'm reading up on the last 
2.5 day's posts so I can make a post. =p
